Class AddAppointmentController

java.lang.Object
cms.stephenwongc195.controller.AddAppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddAppointmentController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
AddAppointmentController class is used to handle adding an appointment.
